# Building an R Package from csv files

```{r convert-md-to-rmd, echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
pkg_build_md_path <- file.path("..", "tools", "README.md")
pkg_build_md <- readLines(pkg_build_md_path)
pkg_build_rmd <- paste0(pkg_build_md[-1], collapse = "\n")
```
